text: Ta chuangzaole xuduo yuanpu, qizhong you mansheng de he zhili de guomu, yu guoshi ge bie di hai zao he bai gu, yu xing tong wei yi de [mu zai] dun he shiliu. Dang jieguo de shihou, nimen keyi cai shi qi guoshi; zai shouhuo de rizi, nimen dang shishe qizhong de yibufen, dan buyaoguo fen. Zhenzhu dique bu xi'aiguo fen de ren.
